title: How to Make Dairy Free Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 375 °F (191 °C).
steps.description: Coat the cookie sheets with nonstick spray or use parchment paper.

steps.headline: Whisk the medium bowl ingredients in a bowl.
Blend the ingredients well using a blender or whisk.
Stir the extra ingredients into the batter.
Let the mixture stand for a few minutes and mix in the flour.
Drop tablespoonfuls of batter onto the cookie sheets.
Bake for about 7 – 10 minutes; be careful not to over bake.

text: Preheat the oven to 375 °F (191 °C). Coat the cookie sheets with nonstick spray or use parchment paper. Whisk the medium bowl ingredients in a bowl. Set the batter aside. Blend the ingredients well using a blender or whisk.  Stir the extra ingredients into the batter.  Let the mixture stand for a few minutes and mix in the flour.  Drop tablespoonfuls of batter onto the cookie sheets.  Bake for about 7 – 10 minutes; be careful not to over bake.  Finished.
